title: Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: The Lord of the Rings is an epic high-fantasy novel written by J.R.R. Tolkien. The story follows hobbit Frodo Baggins as he embarks on a quest to destroy the One Ring and defeat the dark lord Sauron. Along the way, he is aided by a fellowship of allies, including humans, elves, dwarves, and wizards.

title: 3 Idiots
author: Chetan Bhagat
description: 3 Idiots is a story about three friends pursuing an engineering degree at a prestigious Indian college. The book is a humorous and insightful commentary on the Indian education system, as well as a heartwarming tale of friendship and personal growth.

title: Fire and Blood
author: George R. R. Martin
description: Fire and Blood is a book by George R. R. Martin that explores the history of House Targaryen, the ruling family of Westeros in the A Song of Ice and Fire series. The book covers the reign of every Targaryen king from Aegon the Conqueror to the Mad King Aerys II, and includes previously unrevealed details about the Targaryen dynasty and their dragons.

title: Titanic
author: Walter Lord
description: The story of the Titanic disaster

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The first book in the Harry Potter series

title: Playing It My Way
author: Sachin Tendulkar
description: The life story of the legendary cricketer

title: Doglapan
author: Sharat Kumar
description: A suspenseful story about a detective

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel that explores the dangers of totalitarianism and the power of language.
